face.transformationDescription:
[npc.Her] nose and mouth twitch and transform as they push out into a skirren's muzzle, and [npc.her] tongue flattens, thins and grows longer, turning into a similarly animalistic one. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.faceSkin+] quickly grows to cover [npc.her] new face, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, [npc.her] new face is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceSkin+], #ENDIF and as the transformation finally comes to an end, [npc.her] head starts to feel funny, [npc.her] body starts to fill up with energy and it becomes hard to focus. Then as if a switch flicked in [npc.her] head [npc.she] starts to feel happy, really happy as if looking threw the eyes of a child. Ideas run threw [npc.her] head "What does electricity tast like?", "Can I leave a building from the roof?".
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] an [style.boldSquirrel(skirren face and mind)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription]. Within [npc.her] [npc.mouth], [npc.she] has a [style.boldSquirrel(Skirren tongue)]. Roar i'm a cat.
face.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.a_feminineDescriptor(true)], skirren face [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with a muzzle. Chomp.
face.bodyDescriptionFeral: [npc.SheHasFull] the [npc.feminineDescriptor(true)] face of a [npc.legRace], which is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with a muzzle. Chomp.
